name: Walls (Splerp)
description:
Warning - this game is in a pretty incomplete state currently!

Press enter to start. Currently, only keyboard is supported.

Use WASD and Space (jump) to dodge the oncoming walls!
Press Escape to retry from the start.

The game wasn't quite polished and complete for the end of the game jam - the missing features:

  • Death state. You can't lose points and you can't lose the game
  • A good UI (instead of two text lines)
  • Additional wave (group of walls) structures
  • Special modes - reversal, gravity change
  • Additional side wall graphics (windows, doors etc.)
  • Actual balance
  • Player graphics and animation

Regardless, hope you enjoy!
